[Groovy] Class TabUtil

java.lang.Object
  edu.holycross.shot.hocuspocus.TabUtil

class TabUtil

Utility class for working with tabulated representations of texts.

tabEntriesForUrns

java.util.ArrayList tabEntriesForUrns(java.io.File tabFile, java.util.ArrayList urnList)
Finds version-level CTS URNs in a file in tabulated format.
returns:
A list of lines from the tabulated file.
Parameters:
tabFile - The file to search.
urnList - A list of CTS URNs to search for.

tabEntryForUrn

java.lang.String tabEntryForUrn(java.io.File tabFile, CtsUrn urn)
Finds a single version-level CTS URN in a file in tabulated format.
returns:
A line from the tabulated file, or an empty String if no match was found.
Parameters:
tabFile - The file to search.
urn - The CTS URN to search for.
